title: OracleAppears
body:
"Congratulations Chosen One, you have freed all the corrupted figures, saving their lives!"


"However, your quest is not yet over. 

You must now defeat the Basilisk. 

Basilisks's weakness are their eyes.

You must find the most reflective surface on the Square.

Be on your way Chosen One, time is ticking."

[[ Go to the Sun|GototheSun]]

title: Endgamenow
body:
Oracle appears


"You fool! You have doomed us all!"


Basilisk: Screeeeeechhh 



"Can you hear it? The Basilisk is celebrating its victory."


The Basilisk dance in victory. 


The rift opens and swallows everything in Utrecht and spreads through the world. 

The screen goes white. 

Mushroom cloud animation with message. 

"Congratulations the world has ended because of you"

 [[ Oh No! Return to battle |OracleAppears]] [[ Ok. fine by me |end1 lame user stops the game]]

title: end1 lame user stops the game
GoUnderDomTower
body:
The basilisk hiding in the passage under the Tower.


The basilisk sees you. 

It starts rattling its scales. 

It leans towards you, orienting its deadly gaze towards your face. 

A thunderstorm began to growl in its throat.

[[ Look |Death end]] [[ Avert your eyes |Continue]]

body:
"You fool! You have doomed us all!"

title: GotoEnd2
body:
"Congratulations Chosen One, you have saved the World!"


"Here is your reward,take a screenshot now before it goes away"

 [[pick up reward button|pick up reward button]]

title: Pick up son button
body:
Basilisk: "angry" screeeeeech 


Basilisk retreats to the shadows of the Dom Tower.The Basilisk is ready to fight.


[[ Go Under the DOm|GoUnderDomTower]]

title: Use sun button
body:
You take the Sun and puts it in front of your face.


The basilisk jumps back with an angry snarl. 

But it is too late. 

His deadly power is transforming him into a statue. 

The statue shatters. 

The Stone transforms into dust and is aspirated by the time rift. 

The rift slowly closes. 

The Basilisk is defeated.

[[Victory!|GotoEnd2]]
